title: WHEN PEOPLE ON YOUR TEAM GOES AFK / LEAVING THE GAME. GOT IDEA FOR THAT
body:
******Hello everyone and Riot. I am getting very tired of league of legends Because when it actually looks like u are going on a hot streak. And trying to climb the leagues. U always somehow ending up with one person on your team thats feeding the lane and dying for fun. After some mins played. those people goes afk and then its 4vs5 and its bye bye points. Maybe even a demotion for us. I personally think its very sad. That a whole team have to tilt because of one person. NOW! 

- MY IDEA is that when one person goes AFK on ur team. Its should be like that u are not losing any points at all. cuz why does 4 people have to tilt cuz of 1 person having fun with the horrible idea of feeding/leaving the game after they have fed... I think that the one person who goes AFK should lose their points.. 

And if u are turning it around. That ur team is about to lose a game and one goes afk for saving the others points. U will see that im right. NO one want do go afk because who wants to lose their own points for saving others? 

SO I THINK THIS IS A GREAT IDEA OF MAKING THE LEAGUE EVEN AN GREATER GAME THAN IT ALREADY IS. LET ME HEAR YOUR OPINION ON THIS ONE. :)! peace out .******

replies.body: Isn't this a double post... I really was gonna say something valuable but I have to afk.

> NO one want do go afk because who wants to lose their own points for saving others?

duos,  also I can see people being incredibly toxic just to get someone to leave so they don't lose lp.
Yeah I see that. but just cuz if we were a duo. Why would i save my friends ass? and why would anyone wants to leave if they knew only them would lose points?

Ever won a game where someone on the other team went afk? You shouldn't gain LP for those wins right? They shouldn't count....

Moral of the story is your idea has been brought up thousands upon thousands of times and it's not implemented because it's a bad idea.

Ofc. but that is not your teams fault?? So its free points for the enemy team u actually trying to win without any afk/leavers. Why should the not get the points
 
personally i wouldnt mind letting the enemy team get their points. cuz i wont be losing mine anyway?
Do you need see the flaw in your argument? One team is gaining points, the other needs to lose points. You can't have it both ways.
But why should 4 people lose points because of 1 idiot who is leaving the game on purpose

U dont get it...... WHY WOULD U WANT TO LOSE POINTS BECAUSE ONE PERSON FUCKS IT ALL UP. Why not let only that 1 person get punished. 

maybe the 4 others should only lose half of the points instead???

You are the one who doesn't get it. The system is easily abused as noted by the first responder to your thread.

Why would they reduce the amount of points you lose? You will get an equal number of leavers on your team and the opposing team after enough games have been played, so everything balances out.

They introduced remake so that they don't penalize teams who have players who couldn't connect.

Players who leave a game after it has begun are already punished, and there is no need to limit the loss of points to the team that loses.
But its kinda impossible to win 4v5. So they get punished even harder than the person who leaves. Becasue he chose to leav and they are just fucked because of it.
ya thats why they get punished with a low priority queue or suspension etc.
Low priority Que is a bad joke it dosent help at all xD {{item:3187}}
